tool_description: Hello there ! this an API for get the exchange rate of any crypto-coin, give it a try !
name: Crypto Exchange Rate
title: Crypto Exchange Rate

api_list.name: Get currency change
api_list.description: Get the most recent price of any crypto coin.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-exchange-rate1.p.rapidapi.com/exchange-rate/BTC/USD/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-exchange-rate1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-exchange-rate1.p.rapidapi.com/exchange-rate/{cryptocoin}/{normalcoin}/{amount}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-exchange-rate1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
